briefdescription.para: Send a remote event with the specified node as sender.

detaileddescription.para: Assign scene. On the server, this will cause the client to load it. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Assign identity. Called by Network.
Set new controls.

detaileddescription.para: Set the observer position for interest management, to be sent to the server. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set the observer rotation for interest management, to be sent to the server. Note: not used by the NetworkPriority component. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set the connection pending status. Called by Network.

detaileddescription.para: Set whether to log data in/out statistics. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Disconnect. If wait time is non-zero, will block while waiting for disconnect to finish.
Send scene update messages. Called by Network.
Send latest controls from the client. Called by Network.
Send queued remote events. Called by Network.
Send package files to client. Called by network.

detaileddescription.para: Return the scene used by this connection. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return the client controls of this connection.
Return the controls timestamp, sent from client to server along each control update.

detaileddescription.para: Return the observer position sent by the client for interest management. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return the observer rotation sent by the client for interest management. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether is a client connection. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether is fully connected. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether connection is pending. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

Return whether to log data in/out statistics. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return remote address. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return remote port. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return the connection's round trip time in milliseconds. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return the time since last received data from the remote host in milliseconds. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return bytes received per second. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return bytes sent per second. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return packets received per second. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return packets sent per second. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return an address:port string.

detaileddescription.para: Return number of package downloads remaining. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return name of current package download, or empty if no downloads. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return progress of current package download, or 1.0 if no downloads. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Trigger client connection to download a package file from the server. Can be used to download additional resource packages when client is already joined in a scene. The package must have been added as a requirement to the scene the client is joined in, or else the eventual download will fail.
Set network simulation parameters. Called by Network.
Buffered packet size limit, when reached, packet is sent out immediately.
Handle scene loaded event.
Process a LoadScene message from the server. Called by Network.
Process a SceneChecksumError message from the server. Called by Network.
Process a scene update message from the server. Called by Network.
Process package download related messages. Called by Network.
Process an Identity message from the client. Called by Network.
Process a Controls message from the client. Called by Network.
Process a SceneLoaded message from the client. Called by Network.
Process a remote event message from the client or server. Called by Network.
Process a node for sending a network update. Recurses to process depended on node(s) first.
Process a node that the client has not yet received.
Process a node that the client has already received.
Process a SyncPackagesInfo message from server.
Process unknown message. All unknown messages are forwarded as an events.
Check a package list received from server and initiate package downloads as necessary. Return true on success, or false if failed to initialze downloads (cache dir not set).
Initiate a package download.
Send an error reply for a package download.
Handle scene load failure on the server or client.
Handle a package download failure on the client.
Handle all packages loaded successfully. Also called directly on MSG_LOADSCENE if there are none.
Connection to a remote network host.
